graphql.query:
mutation CreateProject($data: ProjectInput!) {
  createProject(data: $data) {
    id
    name
    user {
      email
      id
      name
    }
    attachments
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    status
    memberJoin
    is_recruit
    is_involved
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

mutation UpdateProject($data: ProjectInput!) {
  updateProject(data: $data) {
    id
    name
    attachments
    authorUserId
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    status
    memberJoin
    is_involved
    is_recruit
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query Query {
  allProject {
    id
    name
    user {
      email
      id
      name
    }
    attachments
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    is_recruit
    is_involved
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query DetailProject($detailProjectId: Int) {
  detailProject(id: $detailProjectId) {
    id
    name
    user {
      email
      id
      name
      phone_number
      avatar_attachment
    }
    members{
        id
        position
        memberUser{
            id
            name
            avatar_attachment
        }
    }
    attachments
    authorUserId
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    status
    memberJoin
    is_recruit
    is_involved
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    timeToDo
  }
}

query SearchProject($name: String, $type: String, $status: String) {
  searchProject(name: $name, type: $type, status: $status) {
    id
    name
    user {
      email
      id
      name
      avatar_attachment
    }
    members{
        id
        position
        memberUserId
        memberUser{
            id
            name
            avatar_attachment
        }
    }
    attachments
    authorUserId
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    status
    memberJoin
    is_recruit
    is_involved
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query MyProject {
  myProject {
    id
    name
    user {
      email
      id
      name
    }
    attachments
    authorUserId
    category
    description
    level
    privacy
    version
    budget
    type
    salary
    is_involved
    is_recruit
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

mutation UpdateProjectMembers($data: ProjectMembersInput!) {
  updateProjectMembers(data: $data) {
    id
    pmUserId
    projectId
    memberUserId
    position
    linkTest
    salary
    fee
    status
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

mutation UpdateUserAdvance($data: UserAdvanceInput!) {
  updateUserAdvance(data: $data) {
    id
    roles
    userId
    language
    skill
    info
    programLanguage
    personalGoal
    selfIntroduction
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query AllUserAdvance {
  allUserAdvance {
    id
    userId
    roles
    language
    skill
    info
    plan
    goal
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query Query($userId: Int) {
  detailUserAdvance(userId: $userId) {
    id
    userId
    user{
        id
        name
        email
        phone_number
    }
    roles
    language
    skill
    info
    goal
    numberSelfIdeas
    numberJoinedProject
    numberFramework
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}
